titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2360) making appropriations for the Department of Homeland Security for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2006, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2360) making appropriations for the Department of Homeland Security for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2006, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-83, by Mr. Sessions.
All points of order against consideration of the bill are waived.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 38.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 278.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 222 - 185, 2 Present (Roll no. 175).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2360) making appropriations for the Department of Homeland Security for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2006.
